Table	Create Table
artifacts	CREATE TABLE `artifacts` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `projectId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `type` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `phase` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('not_started','in_progress','completed','reviewed') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'not_started',
  `content` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `generatedContent` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `artifacts_projectId_projects_id_fk` (`projectId`),
  CONSTRAINT `artifacts_projectId_projects_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`projectId`) REFERENCES `fq5wr6YzXYEsLcWqw7mDwv`.`projects` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=180001
